message: Merry Christmas from California
I think Democrats should support Trump on his stupid fight. At least once play like GOP does. I will donate some money for Trump. America should watch this show for a little longer.

what is happening at the refuge...besides some people camping in the cold? People take guns on public land all the time when they're camping... Are you saying the bad words have caused you injury? How? Did you go there, knowing what was going on? How, exactly, are they not being peaceful? They have met with law enforcement, the media, the towns people..no one has been killed..no commerce has been held up. Whereas, the bridge hangers actually endagered themselves, shut down car traffic and river traffic...????
I love it!!! I want one!!!!!

ONE PERSON! A whole classroom of people and only ONE tried to stop him! The people in this country need to stop being victims. I keep picturing those Iraqi solders being marched out by ISIS to be beheaded. If you know you're gonna die FIGHT BACK WITH EVERY FIBER OF YOUR BEING!! As an US Army soldier (12 bravo) and a US Marine (0811) I tip my hat to the ONE gentleman who fought back. GOD BLESS YOU, speedy recovery!
YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!! I love so much!!!!!!! Thank you! Thank you so much for remembering!!!!

It was awful. It took forever to get out of the building because the cops LET the protesters harras people as we walked out the doors. Cops just stood there watching. They were screaming and cursing, threatening all of us. We had to exit RIGHT INTO THE MIDDLE OF NEARLY 1000 Protesters.
